select dv.* from ( SELECT d.id, d.date, d.title, d.content, d.image, d.regdate, d.view, d.member_id, d.diary_scope_id, COUNT(dl.diary_id) AS like_count,
0 `like`
(select count(diary_id) from diary_like where member_id=#{memberId} and diary_id=d.id) AS `like`
FROM (diary d LEFT JOIN diary_like dl ON (d.id = dl.diary_id)) GROUP BY d.id, d.date, d.title, d.content, d.image, d.regdate, d.view, d.member_id, d.diary_scope_id ) dv
date = #{date}
AND member_id = #{memberId}
order by date
